Class Leaderboard

java.lang.Object
model.Leaderboard
public class Leaderboard extends Object
model, represents the 'leaderboard' object. it contains an inner class, a LeaderboardEntry class. the leaderboard is used to track the top 10 leading scores with name, and points. it follows the singleton pattern, so only a single instance of the leaderboard is created. get the leaderboard instance via getInstance(). the leaderboard loads the leaderboard.txt file, converts them into a List of size 10 leaderboardEntries . each leaderboard entry has a name, and a score. it the saves the players score (if high enough) when the player extracts.

  • Constructor Details

    • Leaderboard

      private Leaderboard()
      constructor, initializes the list leaderboardEntries(size 10) (leaderboardEntries calls loadLeaderBoard() method when it is first created

  • Method Details

    • loadLeaderBoard

      private void loadLeaderBoard()
      populates the leaderboardEntries with Leaderboard.LeaderboardEntry. a leaderboard entry contains name of the player and the pts scored

    • addScore

      public void addScore(String name, int score)
      adds the player score into leaderboardEntries ONLY if it is higher than the last one. sorts right after in descending order. calls saveLeaderboard() to save it into the leaderboard.txt file.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      score - total pts of the player

    • saveLeaderboard

      private void saveLeaderboard()
      saves the player score into the leaderboard .txt file it is called automatically when a score gets added via addScore(String name, int score)

    • getLeaderboardEntries

      public List<Leaderboard.LeaderboardEntry> getLeaderboardEntries()
      Returns:
      returns leaderboardEntries list

    • getLeaderbordEntryNames

      public List<String> getLeaderbordEntryNames()
      Returns:
      returns a list the player names

    • getLeaderbordEntryScores

      public List<Integer> getLeaderbordEntryScores()
      Returns:
      returns a list of the leaderboard scores

    • getInstance

      public static Leaderboard getInstance()
      Returns:
      returns the LeaderBoard instance
